description: {"blocks":[{"key":"93n0k","text":"Here, we describe procedure and equipment used for live-imaging of synaptic vesicle precursors. This was performed using DIV21 human iPSC-derived excitatory glutamatergic neurons. Equipment and software used varied based on scheduled upgrades to microscopy equipment during the course of this study.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"1t81s","text":"GlutaMAX™ SupplementGibco - Thermo FisherCatalog #35050061  ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"emljl","text":"B-27™ Supplement (50X), serum freeGibco - Thermo FisherCatalog #17504044  ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6dv7n","text":" Hibernate A low fluorescence media (BrainBits, Cat# HALF)","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a9gdc","text":"Recombinant Human NT-3peprotechCatalog #450-03  ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"efi1m","text":"Recombinant Human/Murine/Rat BDNFpeprotechCatalog #450-02  ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"djtb2","text":"Boecker, C.A., Olenick, M.A., Gallagher, E.R., Ward, M.E., and Holzbaur, E.L.F. (2020). ToolBox: Live Imaging of intracellular organelle transport in induced pluripotent stem cell‐derived neurons. Traffic 21, 138–155.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ee2i7","text":"Kaech, S., and Banker, G. (2006). Culturing hippocampal neurons. Nat. Protoc. 1, 2406–2415.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"98ql7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"96g62","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"73dg2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ka9t","text":"Image human iNeurons on DIV21, 48-72 hours after transfection with PGK-mScarlet-synaptophysin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1vu0n","text":"Please refer to \"Protocol: Culture and transfection of iPSC-derived neurons for live-imaging of axonal cargoes\" for plating and transfection instructions.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6calg","text":"","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5omi1","text":"Replace culture media with low fluorescence imaging media.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5vcvl","text":"For iNeurons, use Hibernate A medium supplemented with:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9chpn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3573k","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cqirv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":[100,100],"data":[["BDNF","10 ng/mL"],["NT-3","10 ng/mL"],["B-27","2%"]],"guid":"45767950273B11EEB92AE973AE31FD23","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["BDNF","10 ng/mL"],["NT-3","10 ng/mL"],["B-27","2%"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1kobc","text":"Image using spinning disk confocal microscope under 60x magnification (oil immersion objective). See “Materials and Methods” for specific microscopes and cameras used.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"etb59","text":"Identify axons of transfected neurons based on morphological parameters. (Boecker et al., 2020; Kaech and Banker, 2006). For example, axons can most reliably be identified by their length and should span over at least 500 µm. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f5htp","text":"Identify the neuronal soma and measure ~100-150 µm from the soma. Create an ROI that includes a segment of the axon that is in the same Z plane. Image several frames at this field of view prior to photobleaching. Perform one photobleaching cycle with the 405 nm laser for 3 ms/pixel. Dramatically decreased mScarlet-SYP signal should be observed in the ROI following photobleaching, and entry of mScarlet-SYP+ vesicles into the bleached region should be readily observed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2t6ap","text":"Acquire time lapse recordings at a frame rate of 5 frames per second for   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":73,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1vrti","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"93nv1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8u0vl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"E1CDAAD0273B11EEB92AE973AE31FD23","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"chp0q","text":"Rapid framerate is preferable due to the high transport speed of SVPs","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3g4uc","text":"Knowledge of the pixel/micron ratio for the specific objective and camera being used is necessary for accurately measuring distances.","type":"unordered-list-item"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"a8g0n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"angvp","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b0frn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"safety","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"47ocg","text":"Investigators should be trained and familiar with the confocal microscope to avoid eye damage from lasers.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
